channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street light not working, 10th December
item.description:
The street light outside 450 Green Lane se9 3tg is not working, leaving a "black hole" in the vicinity. This is dangerous, especially for pedestrians walking on the pavement and even more dangerous for pedestrians attempting to cross the road.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lane, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic caused by Bromley fc, 10th December
item.description:
Yet again Bromley fc are causing huge amounts of traffic problems with the parking by their supporters this cannot go on ! Residents were stuck unable to leave their house, five buses were stuck and could not move and tons of cars just stuck no one could move ! If bromley fc don’t have enough parking inside their venue then they shouldn’t be allowed to continue as they are continuously causing problems along this stretch of road and they should not be allowed to get away with this , they do not care about the residents of Hayes and their arrogant attitudes towards everybody they think they can just do what they want all they care about is making money !! This parking needs to stop along Hayes Lane !!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayes Lane, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
